  proposition: Dipayan Saha et al. published a paper titled "LLM for SoC Security: A Paradigm Shift" in IEEE Access in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dipayan Saha|PUBLISHED|LLM for SoC Security

    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: Ross Williams et al. conducted research on "Epidemic Modeling with Generative Agents" in an arXiv preprint in 2023.

  proposition: Several papers focused on generative models for autonomous driving, including works by Wenzhao Zheng, Yongjie Fu, Anthony Hu, and Shounak Sural.

  proposition: Tianjie Ju et al. studied the "Flooding Spread of Manipulated Knowledge in LLM-Based Multi-Agent Communities" in an arXiv preprint in 2024.

  proposition: Multiple research papers explored Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF), including works by Josef Dai, Tianyu Yu, and Afra Feyza Akyürek.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback|RESEARCH_FOCUS|RLHF
